meanings.definition: A person who freely offers to take part in an enterprise or undertake a task.
meanings.sent1: Many volunteers helped clean up the park.
meanings.sent2: The volunteers worked together to build a new playground.
meanings.sent3: The volunteers joked and laughed while planting trees.
meanings.sent4: The volunteers were like a team of superheroes, saving the day.
meanings.sent5: The volunteers' dedication to their community was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: To offer to do something without being forced to do it.
meanings.sent1: She volunteers at the animal shelter every weekend.
meanings.sent2: He volunteers to help with the school fundraiser.
meanings.sent3: The cat volunteers to chase away the birds from the garden.
meanings.sent4: The river volunteers to guide the lost travelers to safety.
meanings.sent5: The sun volunteers to light up the world every day.

meanings.sent1: The event was a volunteers-only celebration.
meanings.sent2: The volunteers team worked tirelessly to support the cause.
meanings.sent3: The volunteers party was full of laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: The volunteers spirit filled the room with positivity.
meanings.sent5: The volunteers effort made a significant impact on the community.
